entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
